body.description: Only Playtex Sport Tampons have a 360° design and FlexFit technology that moves the way you move. Playtex Sport Tampons are great tampons for swimming, biking, running or whatever your activity of choice is. Playtex Sport Tampons Unscented, feature 360 SPORT LEVEL PROTECTION tampon designed to fit your body and its every move for a protective leakage barrier. with unique FLEXFIT interlocking FIBERS Playtex Sport tampons work quickly to TRAP LEAKS. The contoured applicator of Playtex Sport Tampons allow for COMFORTABLE, precise placement. Playtex Sport Tampons Unscented Super Plus Absorbency, keeping you protected throughout your period. Playtex Sport Tampons - PLAY ON!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Performance Period Gear Our 360° FlexFit design expands to fit your body and move with you - so your period can't slow you down.

Protection For Bodies In Motion 360° Triple Layer Protection Our 360° design expands to fit you from all angles with backup layers for added protection. Leak-Trapping Flexfit Technology FlexFit interlocking fibers move with you and quickly trap leaks. Comfortable Contoured Applicator With a slimmed tip and no-slip grip, our contoured applicator is designed for comfortable, precise placement.

Playtex Sport Playtex Sport Odor Shield Playtex Sport Compact Description: 360° SPORT LEVEL PROTECTION designed to fit and adjust to your body with every move for powerful leak protection. 360° SPORT LEVEL PROTECTION Designed with Odor Shield technology to neutralize odors for ultimate freshness. 360° SPORT LEVEL PROTECTION Designed to comfortably fit your active life and fits in the palm of your hand. Technology: Flex Fit interlocking fibers work quickly to trap leaks. Leak Defense Anti-leak back up layer for extra protection Contoured Tip & No-Slip Grip Applicator For comfortable, precise placement. Odor Shield technology neutralizes odors. Up to 2x more odor fighting protection vs. Playtex Sport Flex Fit Leak Defense Anti-leak back up layer for extra protection Contoured Tip & No- Slip Grip Applicator for comfortable, precise placement. Designed with Compact Applicator. Pull and Click into Place. 30% Smaller than full-size tampons *based on length before extension Flex Fit interlocking fibers work quickly to trap leaks. Leak Defense Anti-leak back up layer for extra protection. Absorbency: Regular, Super, Super Plus, Ultra Regular, Super Regular, Super Scent: Unscented Unscented Unscented

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My go-to for years
reviews.reviewText: The standout feature of Playtex Ultra Tampons is their impressive absorption capabilities. Even on my heaviest flow days, these tampons provide the protection I need, ensuring I can carry on with my daily activities without worry. Their high absorbency is truly unmatched.The unique design of Playtex Ultra Tampons ensures a comfortable and secure fit. The tampons are designed to expand gently to fit your body, providing a snug and leak-proof seal. I often forget I'm even wearing them because they are so comfortable.The tampons come with a smooth, plastic applicator that makes insertion quick and hassle-free. The grip is easy to hold, and the tampon slides into place effortlessly. Clear instructions on the packaging are helpful for users of all experience levels.Playtex Ultra Tampons are excellent at preventing leaks. They have a unique 360-degree design that ensures no menstrual fluid escapes, giving you the confidence to go about your day worry-free.The materials used in Playtex Ultra Tampons are gentle on the skin, which is essential for avoiding irritation and discomfort. I've experienced minimal to no skin issues using these tampons, even during long, heavy flow days.In conclusion, Playtex Ultra Tampons are the epitome of reliable period protection. With their exceptional absorption, comfortable fit, and leak protection, they make menstruation much more manageable. The ease of application, discreetness, and skin-friendly materials are the icing on the cake. If you're looking for tampons that truly deliver on their promises, Playtex Ultra Tampons are a top choice. They have earned their place as my preferred period product, and I highly recommend them to anyone seeking comfort and confidence during their menstrual cycle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Never in stock locally!
reviews.reviewText: I love these tampons! They are easy to use and very absorbent. I usually can't find the ultra size locally. There are other brands that I settle for but to me these are the best. That's why they're always sold out where I live.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are wonderful for those strong heavy flows. Some of us ladies tend to have extreme heavy periods that the super tampons won’t cut it. These ultra tampons are definitely it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Favorite Brand Of Tampons!!
reviews.reviewText: I love this brand. Minimal leaks and moves with you. I can’t hardly find the ultra where I live so I have to buy them on my favorite website to shop ‘AMAZON’!! I’m an Amazon fan for sure. It’s my go to always.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not my top pick but..
reviews.reviewText: Though I hate using these as they are full of toxins, I cannot find ultra size in the clean products.. so sometimes you just have to choose your battles🙃Also, it's hard to find tampons that are as comfortable as the Playtex Sport. The 360 is LIFE CHANGING.Just wish they cared about their consumers more than money.

reviews.reviewText: Made like menstrual cup. I have heavy period due to fibroids and these work great !
